ingredients: 1 tablespoon olive oil, 1 medium onion, chopped, 2 cloves garlic, minced, 1 inch ginger, grated, 1 teaspoon cumin powder, 1 teaspoon coriander powder, 1/2 teaspoon turmeric powder, 1/4 teaspoon cayenne pepper, 14.5 ounce can diced tomatoes, 15 ounce can chickpeas, 5 ounces spinach, 1/2 cup vegetable, Salt, Fresh cilantro, basmati rice
